name: SchoolRBT — RBT Exam Hub
description: The hub for school-based RBTs. 500 practice questions, mock exams, SAFMEDS mode, custom flashcard decks, error analysis, and the full 2026 RBT Task List + Ethics Code. Phase 2 underway with supervisor dashboard and adaptive learning.

name: RBT Study — Exam Prep
description: 500 practice questions, mock exams, domain breakdowns, SAFMEDS timed drills, and AI-powered study plans for school-based RBTs. $49/mo subscription.

name: Supervision Platform
description: Full supervision ecosystem for BCBAs and RBTs. Supervision hour logging, CEU tracker, Supervisor Marketplace, Trainee Readiness Dashboard, AI session generator with PDF export, and job board. BACB-compliant fieldwork tracking.

name: Behavior School Plan
description: AI-powered FBA, BIP, and IEP goal writing platform for BCBAs. FERPA-encrypted student management, 14-day trial, Stripe billing.

name: ACE CEU Platform
description: BACB-approved continuing education courses for BCBAs and RBT PDUs. Video hosting via Cloudflare R2. Final deploy pending R2 credentials.

name: ReunifyScience Tools
description: Evidence-based assessments and tools for family reunification professionals. Rule-Governed vs Contingency-Shaped assessment, Fusion FA tool, CA Family Law Library, and Risk & Protective Factors research hub.

name: ObservationPro Watch App
description: Professional behavior data collection for Apple Watch. Stealth mode, AI-powered ABC parsing, dual-tracker. In active development.

name: KCUSD Behavior Team Hub
description: Internal tool suite for the KCUSD Behavior Intervention Team. Case management, goal bank, observation tools, assessment process tracker. Also serves as the beta lab for new features across the BehaviorSchool ecosystem.
